intro.description: In this step you will create a new Qompass Model for MARTE, i.e. a MODEL that applied MARTE GCM as well as the FCM profile.

item.title: Papyrus Perspective
item.description: Start setting up your environment's perspective.

subitem.label:
Start creating the project that will host your model or create a new model within an existing project.
File > New > Project > Papyrus project > Enter your project name, then select UML as diagram language. On the next page, choose the Qompass template for MARTE.
